chapter.title: Access User-specific Information
chapter.para: An application can use the following API resources to access information specific to the current user that can be used to determine access to certain &PRODUCTABBR; resources or to display information back to the user. This is for applications targeted at day-to-day use by end users that interact with education data, including Secure Data Service administrators, educators, students, or others who have user accounts in the tenant's IDP.
